content:
The spokesman of the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the captain of the 3rd rank Dmitry Pletenchuk, said that the Russian invaders had to be withdrawn from the temporarily occupied Crimea almost all their most valuable fleet.

Dmitry Pletenchuk provided his comments duringlive etherOn March 30, 2024, March 30, 2024.

“The main force, of course, in the Crimea was considered a fleet. And now it is possible to say almost in full Crimea, ”said the spokesman of the Navy of the Armed Forces.

He added that the Cyclone Ship is currently in Crimea now

"Bred… If you take the carriers of the winged missiles, in fact, everyone but one is sorry, a failure that has not yet launched a single missile. Although it is considered a carpet carrier. This is about Cyclone now, ”Dmitry Pletenchuk said.

According to him, the enemy relocated the main combat units to Novorossiysk.

“There (in Crimea, - ed.) Left, if not those who are not sorry, then those who are probably simply not placed. The most valuable assets were all withdrawn by taking ships, ”the Navy of the Armed Forces said.

As reported by the Armyinform, in the Navy of the Armed Forcescalled the strange situationwith Russian calibers.
title: In the Navy of the Armed Forces, they told about the Russian-naval ship in Crimea
description: Dmitry Pletenchuk gave his comments during the live broadcasting of "One News" ...
author: Army Inform
